title: Oh yay low priority queue again (thanks optus)
body: Internet sucks and now im at 20 min wait(having a wait as long as much game...funfun.) but I will never give up (even though the 3 times i've been given a low priority sticker have done nothing to help with my internet) meh... I might as well get a perma ban for having shitty internet so the waits are riot's messages to me to stop playing if u have shitty internet...but like I said... I will never give up! u hear me riot? I will never give up......

replies.body: oh and somehow lux's lucent singularity became translucent singularity... or  is it just me

THANKS TPG!!!!

Still got that Korean family tho.
